description.zh: Navidrome 是一个开源的基于网页的音乐收藏服务器和流媒体平台，允许用户通过任何浏览器或移动设备访问自己的个人音乐库。它提供了类似 Spotify 的自托管替代方案，支持大型音乐收藏和多用户使用。该平台设计轻量、跨平台，并兼容多种音频格式和元数据。
description.en: Navidrome is an open-source web-based music collection server and streaming platform that allows users to access their personal music library from any browser or mobile device. It offers a self-hosted alternative to services like Spotify, with support for large music collections and multiple users. The platform is designed to be low-resource, multi-platform, and compatible with various audio formats and metadata.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供商业音乐流媒体服务的自托管替代方案
- 资源占用低，运行高效
- 支持多种音频格式和元数据
- 支持多用户个性化使用
- 跨平台兼容桌面与移动端

## 功能列表:

- 支持管理超大音乐收藏库
- 几乎支持所有音频格式的流媒体播放
- 读取并使用完整的音乐元数据
- 良好支持合辑（多艺术家专辑）和套盒（多碟专辑）
- 支持多用户，每位用户拥有独立的播放记录、播放列表和收藏
- 资源占用极低
- 支持 macOS、Linux 和 Windows，提供 Docker 镜像
- 提供适用于主流平台（含树莓派）的即用型二进制文件
- 自动监控音乐库变化并导入新文件
- 基于 Material UI 的可定制化现代网页界面
- 兼容所有 Subsonic/Madsonic/Airsonic 客户端
- 支持实时转码，含 Opus 编码
- 支持多种语言翻译
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Provides a self-hosted alternative to commercial music streaming services
- Offers low resource consumption for efficient performance
- Supports a wide range of audio formats and metadata
- Enables multi-user access with personalized settings
- Cross-platform compatibility with desktop and mobile interfaces

## Features:

- Handles very large music collections
- Streams virtually any audio format available
- Reads and uses all your beautifully curated metadata
- Great support for compilations and box sets
- Multi-user with individual play counts, playlists, and favorites
- Low resource usage
- Multi-platform (macOS, Linux, Windows) with Docker support
- Ready-to-use binaries including Raspberry Pi
- Automatically monitors and updates music library
- Themeable web interface based on Material UI
- Compatible with Subsonic/Madsonic/Airsonic clients
- On-the-fly transcoding with Opus encoding support
- Translated to various languages
